job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Make your mark as a .NET software engineer with a focus on AI at Boskalis. In this challenging role you will be instrumental in building and optimizing AI-powered applications and services. You will work closely with other software engineers and AI specialists to integrate AI models and algorithms into our .NET applications, ensuring they are scalable, efficient, and seamlessly integrated within our business applications and Microsoft environment. Next to that you will also be responsible for the maintenance of and keeping older applications up to date., * Design, develop, and maintain AI-enhanced .NET applications using Microsoft technologies.
     * Collaborate with AI researchers to integrate AI models into applications.
     * Ensure applications are scalable, secure, and compliant with best practices.
     * Participate in code reviews, unit testing, and integration testing.
     * Stay abreast of developments in AI technologies and .NET frameworks to continually enhance our offerings.
job_details.full_text:
NET Software Engineer (AI Focus)

Make your mark as a .NET software engineer with a focus on AI at Boskalis. In this challenging role you will be instrumental in building and optimizing AI-powered applications and services. You will work closely with other software engineers and AI specialists to integrate AI models and algorithms into our .NET applications, ensuring they are scalable, efficient, and seamlessly integrated within our business applications and Microsoft environment. Next to that you will also be responsible for the maintenance of and keeping older applications up to date., * Design, develop, and maintain AI-enhanced .NET applications using Microsoft technologies.
     * Collaborate with AI researchers to integrate AI models into applications.
     * Ensure applications are scalable, secure, and compliant with best practices.
     * Participate in code reviews, unit testing, and integration testing.
     * Stay abreast of developments in AI technologies and .NET frameworks to continually enhance our offerings.

profile_classification.rationale: The role focuses on integrating AI models and algorithms into .NET applications, emphasizing building and optimizing AI-powered services. While it involves .NET development, the core is applying AI, particularly through collaboration with AI researchers and ensuring seamless integration of AI models, aligning with the GenAI Engineer profile's focus on developing user-facing systems powered by AI.

job_tasks.phrase: Design, develop, and maintain AI-enhanced .NET applications using Microsoft technologies.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the creation and upkeep of software applications, which is the core of software development. The mention of '.NET applications' and 'Microsoft technologies' further specifies the development environment.

job_tasks.phrase: ensure they are scalable, efficient, and seamlessly integrated within our business applications and Microsoft environment.
job_tasks.justification: This describes key aspects of building robust software systems, focusing on non-functional requirements like scalability and integration, which are fundamental to software development.

job_tasks.phrase: responsible for the maintenance of and keeping older applications up to date.
job_tasks.justification: Maintenance and updating of existing applications are standard software development lifecycle activities.

job_tasks.phrase: integrate AI models and algorithms into our .NET applications
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the incorporation of pre-existing or developed AI models and algorithms into software, which is a key aspect of applying modeling techniques within an application context.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with AI researchers to integrate AI models into applications.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the interaction with specialists to bring AI models into the application, directly relating to the application and integration of modeling outputs.

job_tasks.phrase: ensuring they are scalable, efficient, and seamlessly integrated
job_tasks.justification: While also related to software development, ensuring scalability and efficiency in production environments touches upon operational concerns for deployed AI-enhanced applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Participate in code reviews, unit testing, and integration testing.
job_tasks.justification: These are standard software development practices focused on ensuring code quality and functionality before and during deployment.
Optimization of AI-powered applications can involve aspects of data processing and pipeline refinement, though it's less explicit than other tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Stay abreast of developments in AI technologies and .NET frameworks to continually enhance our offerings.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly calls for continuous learning and adaptation to new technologies in a rapidly changing field.

job_tasks.phrase: seamlessly integrated within our business applications
job_tasks.justification: This implies understanding how the AI-enhanced applications fit into the broader business context and existing systems.

soft_skills.phrase: Stay abreast of developments in AI technologies and .NET frameworks to continually enhance our offerings.
You will work closely with other software engineers and AI specialists
Collaborate with AI researchers to integrate AI models into applications.
building and optimizing AI-powered applications and services
ensure they are scalable, efficient, and seamlessly integrated
Make your mark as a .NET software engineer with a focus on AI
